name: BizBol
overview:
BizBol is a community built around a local market The Idea is to create a online Local Market Community and let it’s loyal Customer know that the things that they are looking for is available locally and where before buying online or going to the Local Market and get updates of events from this Market Community.

Another : To forms a simple efficient chain and flow of content: Brand > Retailers > Customer within a local space .

Brand ( promote offers, through associated Retails Stores) > B2C (as announcement /coupons) > P2P ( coupons terms - invite 5 people to print coupons)

P2P (review) > C2B (feed backs,what’s hot or cold) > B2B ( BI to make more likeable product,to generates deeper value.

Serializing and centralizing content able Brand for a wider & fast penetration while their channel partner benefits as content attracts traffic and conversions By Product : Plug in Shop of vertical sector across vertical sectors connected for the flow of content.

Market Analysis

Why Bizbol ? For end User: Local market online / find connection near you / discover deals and product near you or in your local market from home / compare and take action.

First it give option to compare in their local marketplace and get feedback from the other user of products or review stores or services before taking any action. Specially in India where majority of web user research a product online the go to local store and buy them, thus listing of all local store in the same segment will provide good research. User can share / chat / order online with cash on delivery /follow local store and get updates on offers.

Why Bizbol ? For Brand & Channel Partners: By listing their product and services, associate local stores can easy add their products on it’s online store , so the Brand product get more exposure and deeper penetration and feedback received from end user help them directly connect with end customer. Why NOW ? For small Retail business Its like security against emerging big boys. Mission

To form a simple and efficient chain; Manufacturer/ Brand to Retailers/shopkeeper to end customer. We target Small and local business empowering them to compete with the big player to sell , promote , generate leads / generate discount coupons / CRM services ( to push eDM / sms) ; all and many more from a single online platform which acts like a landing page, an inbound link to inform ,updates,induce a call for action,greater ROI for, Brand and their associated Store owner. Resulting 1) always flow of new content, 2) easily channeled and moving forward and 3) having geo tagged message so the response and conversion become greater. 3) End user informed about new product and services and now where to find them local.

History: Bizbol.com a online business portal for small and large scale business is owned and operated by Orgapp Technologies Pvt. LTD, a company incorporated under the laws of India, registered office at Bangalore, India, is to provide web publishing services. Started as findall.in in 2007, change to bizbol.com in 2010 to make it more suitable in India ,presently it region of operations.
